Keywords: Future , Horsemen , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Rasputin IV
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering, Blocking, Characters
MUTANT CHIMERA: When Rasputin uses the X-Men team ability to heal another character, this turn that character's damage becomes 4. // When another character uses the X-Men team ability to heal Rasputin, this turn her attack and damage values become equal to that character's printed values.
INTANGIBLE AND UNTOUCHABLE: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses. // At the end of your turn, choose a side of the square Rasputin occupies. Until your next turn, lines of fire that cross that side of the square are blocked.
HEALING FACTOR: When Rasputin clears action tokens, heal her 1 click.

@Havickzback Choosing a side is at the end of your turn so the only time your point should be an issue is if a Rasputin gets moved or placed during the end of the turn.

So they�ve made the language vague enough that last night during a game She was moved out of the square she was occupying, and the blocking side of the square remained where she had been and didn�t move with her. I hated that outcome but the language makes the argument for it.
January 16, 2021
Cyke82
[QUOTE=Kskins3]Does her blocking thing block lines of fire from elevated characters shooting down on her? (As long as it crosses that line) can colossals hit her?[/QUOTE] I would say yes. Her effect doesn't create any sort of terrain that a colossal might be able to bypass through its Great Size ability. It simply says that if the LOF crosses the side of the square she chose, it's blocked. I would think that would apply to any opposing piece drawing LOF to her.

(As long as it crosses that line) can colossals hit her?
